DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the highest tolerated dose, safety and activity of HCD122 in patients with chronic lymphocytic leukemia who are relapsed after receiving prior treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Dose-finding Trial of HCD122 in Patients With Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL) That is Relapsed or Non-responsive to Prior Fludaribine Therapy
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of CLL requiring treatment Refractory or relapsed disease Prior treatment with fludarabine Male or Female >18 years of age Treatment with rituximab within 90 days and alemtuzumab or any monoclonal antibody within 6 months. Clinically significant cardiac dysfunction or other significant organ dysfunction Additional eligibility criteria apply that will be reviewed with potential study subjects at the site.
